basic_info.description: üëã I'm Rey Mercado.  I'm working with an in-demand front-end framework React. I am studying to become a full-stack developer at Code Fellows and will be open to being hired by end of March 2022. What you are seeing now is a portfolio template from Code Fellows, assigned to me to personalize as part of an assignment for their 301 Course. If you like this portfolio template, make sure to ‚≠ê the repository to make it more recognizable for other users. Thank you üíú

projects.title: My BART Train is leaving when?
projects.description: Final Project submitted on 18 October 2018 to Galvanize's Front End course that ended 20 October 2018. I was asked to create an app using vanilla JS that connected to a public API. I chose to use San Francisco's BART Bay Area Rapid Transit API that is provided free to all developers to make their own apps.
